mapper.sql: SELECT b.board_id board_id, b.title title, b.content content, b.date date, b.view_count view_count, b.picture picture, b.status status, b.user_id user_id,u.password password, u.nickName nickName, u.address address, b.area_id area_id, a.area_name area_name, b.category_id category_id, c.category_name category_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, date, picture, view_count, status, user_id, area_id, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{picture}, #{viewCount}, #{status}, #{user.userId}, #{area.areaId}, #{category.categoryId})
mapper.select: FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN area a on b.area_id = a.area_id JOIN category c on b.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY b.board_id DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date= #{date}, picture = #{picture}, status = #{status}, area_id = #{area.areaId}, category_id = #{category.categoryId} WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u on b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN area a on b.area_id = a.area_id JOIN category c on b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') ORDER BY b.board_id DESC;
